name: Streetview / DC
overview: We're looking at Washington, DC-area store advertising.  Find _{{ company_name }}_ at {{ paddress_1 }} {{ city }}, {{ state }} {{ zip }}, it might also be {{ trade_name }}.  Use the streetview navigation (the arrows) to move between images, the rotate and orient the camera to answer the following questions.

questions.text: Were you able to find the store or address?
questions.smsText: Were you able to find the store or address? (1=Yes, found the store,2=Found the address, but not the store,3=Can't find the address or the store)

choices.text: Found the address, but not the store
Can't find the address or the store

questions.text: Frame a picture so get the front of the store as best you can.   Note that if you are fully zoomed in, the thumbnail below may look reflect the full zoom.
questions.smsText: Frame a picture so get the front of the store as best you can.   Note that if you are fully zoomed in, the thumbnail below may look reflect the full zoom.

questions.text: Frame the window with the most advertising.
questions.smsText: Frame the window with the most advertising.

questions.text: We're looking for stores with tobacco advertising.  On a scale of 1-5, what is your best guess as to if this store has exterior tobacco ads, where 1 is that the store definitely does *NOT* have tobacco ads, and 5 is that they definitely DO,
questions.smsText: We're looking for stores with tobacco advertising.  On a scale of 1-5, what is your best guess as to if this store has exterior tobacco ads, where 1 is that the store definitely does *NOT* have tobacco ads, and 5 is that they definitely DO,  (1=Definitely Not 5=Definitely)

questions.text: Anything else you'd like to report?
questions.smsText: Anything else you'd like to report?
